thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 6 of 95
thread.title: Jason Patrick Hall
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Jason Patrick Hall

author: Jason Patrick Hall
title: Jason Patrick Hall
text: I unconditionally loved my Dior order. I ordered J'adore and Miss Dior soaps and a bar of Sauvage deodorant. It's made my life much brighter, serously has. I also received samples of a couple fragrances, nice. I'm looking to purchase a black scarf, a black sweater, a black hooded sweater and a wallet. These items are only available in boutiques. I have to be able to look at the inventory at the Dior Homme store on Rodeo in Beverly Hills.
